items.title: Minneapolis Police just murdered Daunte Wright, who was 20 years...
items.content_html:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

Minneapolis Police just murdered Daunte Wright, who was 20 years old. He was shot to death after being pulled over apparently for having air fresheners hanging from his rear view mirror.

Eleven months ago, Minneapolis police murdered George Floyd, sparking a nationwide uprising against racism. Tomorrow marks the beginning of the third week of George Floyd’s murderer’s trial.

Minneapolis is once again up in protest, and the police are once again meeting the people with violen...t repression. It is clear that all the talk about the protests and the Chauvin trial making police think differently about their violence is a lie. We need a movement of the people strong enough to take away the power of the police to kill and terrorize with impunity.

Daunte Wright’s mom said tonight, “I just want people to know that if you get pulled over, make sure you put your hands up and don’t make any sudden moves, and don’t have air fresheners in your car because that’s why he got pulled over. And he was only 20 years old and he didn’t deserve to be shot and killed like this.”

Rest in power, Daunte. Say his name #DAUNTEWRIGHT

See More

items.title: Today on Meet the Press, Biden’s Secretary of State Anthony...
items.content_html:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

Today on Meet the Press, Biden’s Secretary of State Anthony Blinken criticized China, arguing that the country’s “failure” to cooperate in the early stages of the virus led to the situation getting “out of hand.”

“I think China knows that in the early stages of Covid, it didn't do what it needed to do, which was to, in real time, give access to international experts, in real time to share information, in real time to provide real transparency,” he said.

Back in reality, China... sequenced the COVID genome last year just weeks after the first cases in that country, immediately sharing this info FOR FREE with the world to allow the development of tests. China then shared their tests around the world, while the US refused to produce or share any tests that didn’t create huge profits for pharmaceutical corps. China's handling of the virus within its own borders helped stop the spread of the virus, and this fall Chinese citizens were basically living in normal conditions, with few masks or social distancing. Meanwhile, the US refusal to handle COVID in any responsible way actually hurt other countries, as cases spread from the US around the world. Now, China is sharing COVID vaccines with developing countries in Africa and Asia, and even Mexico, while the US hoards vaccines for profit.

Blinken, the US state, and US media have consistently attacked China's COVID response. But their attacks are consistently separated from reality. In fact, it is the criminal irresponsibility of the US state that lead to millions of deaths. It’s the US' refusal to cooperate with other countries that hampered the quick production and sharing of COVID tests, and now vaccines. The world would be better off with more countries like China — and less countries like the US.

See More

Now it’s time we push for CO District Attorneys @brianmason.us and @johnkellnerco to drop ALL the charges, and finally arrest the actual murderers of Elijah McClain! #dropthechargesco #justiceforelijahmcclain

items.title: The only way to win the demands we so desperately need —...
items.content_html:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

The only way to win the demands we so desperately need — universal health care; affordable, quality housing; full rights for all immigrants; an end to mass incarceration; an end to wars for profit; and more — is to build a socialist movement of millions of people who are demanding radical solutions to the grievous injustices caused by capitalism.

Don’t agonize, organize! Fight back! Join the Party for Socialism & Liberation: https://www.pslweb.org/join

Read more about Florynce Kennedy here: https://www.breakingthechainsmag.org/women-fighters-our-te…/

items.title: TEN DAYS. The reality is that this is unsurprising—sexual...
items.content_html:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

TEN DAYS. The reality is that this is unsurprising—sexual misconduct is commonplace within the ranks of the police. In fact, sexual abuse is the second most reported form of police misconduct, following only excessive force. This is why building community power as a counterweight to the impunity of the police is so critical.

A Denver police officer will serve a 10-day suspension for an “inappropriate” relationship with a 17-year old girl.

kdvr.com

Denver police officer suspended 10 days, accused of grooming 17-year-old

items.title: Happy birthday to Vilma Espín, an exemplary revolutionary not...
items.content_html:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

Happy birthday to Vilma Espín, an exemplary revolutionary not only for Cuba but for the world!

Her actions, from an early age, in the clandestine struggle against the Batista tyranny, her outstanding leadership in the continuous campaign for the advancement of women in society, and her total dedication to the Revolution were and always will be examples for us to follow.

Among the luminous lights of the beacon that is the Cuban revolution, is the life of Vilma. We will always ...remember her firmness in the struggle; her grace and her love of justice for her people.

Read more about revolutionary Cuban women here: https://liberationschool.org/07-03-01-the-revolutionary-ro…/

items.title: "While certainly it is a meaningful step towards justice...
items.content_html:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

"While certainly it is a meaningful step towards justice from District Attorney John Kellner, the downgrading of this political prosecution is not enough. Not a single charge would have been filed were it not part of a punitive attack initiated by the prior administrations against protest leaders who challenged the impunity of the police.... It is the embarrassment caused by these protests—not the commission of any crimes—which triggered this retaliatory prosecution.

We conti...nue to call on both prosecuting District Attorneys John Kellner and Brian Mason to drop ALL charges against the leaders of the peaceful protests for justice for Elijah McClain. While the charges were filed by their predecessors George Brauchler and Dave Young, any continuation of the criminal prosecution perpetuates this miscarriage of justice."

The targeted organizers still face up to 16 years behind bars — the fight is not over! John Kellner for District Attorney Brian Mason for District Attorney, drop all the charges!

#DroptheChargesCO

items.title: 70 years ago today, Julius and Ethel Rosenberg were sentenced to...
items.content_html:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

70 years ago today, Julius and Ethel Rosenberg were sentenced to death after a Cold War court convicted them of "espionage." They were murdered by the US state two years later, on June 19, 1953.

The Rosenbergs' courage to refuse to "name names" and to be progressive activists in the United States despite their facing of the death penalty should be remembered and commended.

The Rosenbergs were accused of giving "atomic secrets" to the Soviet Union. In reality, their true crime... was solidarity and progressive activism when the full force of the US state was focused on destroying the USSR and the communist and progressive movements in the US. Their notoriously corrupt trial was given constant media attention and used to spread fear of a "communist threat." Despite this, millions around the world, including prominent intellectuals, religious figures, and world leaders called for their release.

Long live the courage and memory of Julius and Ethel Rosenberg.

Read more here: https://www.liberationnews.org/julius-and-ethel-rosenberg-…/

See More

items.title: For the 4th time in 5 months, detainees at St. Louis City’s...
items.content_html:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

For the 4th time in 5 months, detainees at St. Louis City’s downtown jail have risen up.

Tonight they demanded to be allowed to have court dates, a reference to the long pretrial holds routine in the facility (and indeed very common in the country), only made worse by delays during the pandemic. According to data compiled by the public defender’s office, the average wait for a preliminary hearing for detainees in the City Justice Center in 2020 was 146 days.

Read our intervie...w with and EXPO St Louis organizer after the February 6 uprising here: https://www.liberationnews.org/interview-formerly-incarcer…/

And read about the protests about the conditions from the perspective of an incarcerated person here: https://www.liberationnews.org/letter-from-an-inmate-st-lo…/

See MoreExpo St. LouisSecond Uprising at the Criminal Justice Center in downtown St. Louis. Detainees are screaming that they want court dates!!Second Uprising at the Criminal Justice Center in downtown St. Louis. Detainees are screaming that they want court dates!!
